name: Let's Play: Flight Attendant
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Please place your luggage above your head, bring your seat to the upright position and fasten your seatbelt...

In Let's Play Flight Attendant, you could have the chance to serve a famous person in 1st class! Will it be a millionaire or a movie star? >ul>
  • Put up your hair, choose your lipstick, color and dress yourself in your favorite uniform
  • Serve customers fresh drinks and tasty sandwiches
  • Show the passengers the safety instructions
  • Succeed and earn stars to become the best flight attendant!
